description: Ellis Barr is a hardworking writer from Nevada looking to unwind and relax a little. Pent up from his job as a marketing manager, he comes to California with an urge to let loose and let it all hang out. So he wastes no time peeling off his suit coat and unbuttoning his shirt, unzipping his slacks and slipping out of his shoes, reclining in a window seat beneath the sunlit mountainside. Ellis grabs his cock at the base and starts working it with both hands, fingering the head a bit and rubbing the pre-cum between his fingers, losing his pent up load all over himself in a glistening release quite some time in the making.Enjoy!
title: Ellis Barr
